data.title: Rivershire Place
data.meta_description: Rivershire Place is ready for your family to enjoy all the benefits of a new construction townhouse in Villa Rica.
data.text:
Brand New Townhomes in Villa Rica, GA – Perfect for Your Atlanta Commute!

Why settle for renting when you can take pride in owning a townhouse in Carroll county at Rivershire Place? These beautiful homes are a great price, starting at $269,990, and even qualify for USDA-backed 100% financing! Located within 30 minutes of the Atlanta Perimeter, these homes are favorably priced, with 3 bedrooms, private patios, and full lawn and exterior maintenance. Not to mention that qualifying for this type of financing is a truly rare gem in the Atlanta housing market! Take advantage of this opportunity and own a new townhome for under $2k* a month! You cannot beat this investment in your future!

Where Can You Find this Great Deal on a New Townhome?

The low maintenance homes in Rivershire Place are just a stone’s throw away from the Tanner Medical Center (less than 3 miles away) and 1 mile from Interstate 20 in Villa Rica. With easy access to both I-20 and Hwy 78 through Douglas County, or Hwy 61 connecting Paulding County and Carroll County, you can easily commute to work or school anywhere on the Westend side of Atlanta.

What Kind of Lifestyle Can You Expect Here?
